paragraphs: Hello there, I am Kevin Herrera
I am a professional game developer with more than 6 years developing games, and quality assurance engineer with 3 years of work experience.
I believe that videogames have have more to offer when it comes to delivering deep interactive experiences.
So, I am trying to construct a carrear as game designer to learn and discover how to create better game experiences.
You can view all the game I have made as an indie developer at: https://aaronclaros.itch.io/
Visit my blog if you what to read what I have learned.
If you want to talk, my email is: kevin031995@gmail.com
